#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main(){
    int t, n, max, min, ans, sum, ap;
    cin>>t;
    int arr[51];
    while(t--){
        cin>>n;
        sum = 0; ap = (n-1)*(n)/2;
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
            cin>>arr[i];
            sum += arr[i];
        }
        ans = 0;
        if((sum+ap)%n == 0){
            max = (sum+ap)/n;
            min = max-n+1;
            for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
                if(arr[i] > (min+i)){
                    ans+=(arr[i]-(min+i));
                }
            }
            cout<<ans<<endl;
        }
        else{
            cout<<-1<<endl;
        }
    }
}
